Package spring2024.cs472.hotelwebsite.controllers

Class AvailableReservationsAdminController

java.lang.Object
spring2024.cs472.hotelwebsite.controllers.AvailableReservationsAdminController
@Controller public class AvailableReservationsAdminController extends Object
This class handles requests related to available reservations for administrators. It provides methods for filtering available reservations, adding them to the cart, etc.
Author:
Team ABCFG

  • Method Details

    • availableReservations

      @GetMapping("/availableReservationsAdmin") public String availableReservations(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Handles requests to display available reservations for administrators.
      Parameters:
      model - The Model object to add attributes for the view.
      session - The HttpSession object to check the admin session.
      Returns:
      The view name for displaying available reservations.

    • filterAvailableReservations

      @PostMapping("/availableReservationsAdmin/filter") public String filterAvailableReservations(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @RequestParam LocalDate startDate, @RequestParam LocalDate endDate, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Handles requests to filter available reservations based on start and end dates.
      Parameters:
      model - The Model object to add attributes for the view.
      startDate - The start date for filtering reservations.
      endDate - The end date for filtering reservations.
      session - The HttpSession object to check the admin session.
      Returns:
      The view name for displaying filtered available reservations.

    • addToCart

      @PostMapping("/availableReservationsAdmin/addToReservations") public String addToCart(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session, @RequestParam("selected") List<Integer> selectedRooms, @RequestParam LocalDate start, @RequestParam LocalDate end, @RequestParam Guest guest)
      Handles requests to add selected rooms to the cart for reservation.
      Parameters:
      model - The Model object to add attributes for the view.
      session - The HttpSession object to check the admin session.
      selectedRooms - The list of IDs of selected rooms.
      start - The start date for the reservation.
      end - The end date for the reservation.
      guest - The guest object associated with the reservation.
      Returns:
      The redirect view name for the cart page.
